tool_description: Searches academic databases to find potential reviewers based on research areas, keywords, and institutional criteria.

research_keywords.description: Keywords related to the research topic

institution_type.description: Type of institution: university, industry, government, nonprofit

max_results.description: Maximum number of experts to return

error_messages: Invalid field of study: Provide a recognized academic discipline.
Too many keywords: Limit keywords to 20 or fewer for effective search.
Invalid institution type: Use one of [university, industry, government, nonprofit] or leave blank.
Invalid max_results: Must be between 1 and 200.
usage: Provide research_keywords and field_of_study to find relevant experts. Optionally filter by institution_type, geographic_region, and limit results with max_results.

search_summary.description: Summary of search parameters and results count
